channel.title: [FM] Viva la Revolution Reroll - Town Wins!
channel.description:
# Welcome to Viva la Revolution (The reroll)!
A game mode where four factions fight against each other, though some do have the potential to win with others. While the town is large, the other three factions are only one member each. ## Mechanics • Days last 72 hours, and nights last 24 hours. • Lynch is majority. There is no day one lynch, and day one ends when all players have confirmed. • There are no wills/journals. • Multiple antagonist factions are capable of winning the game, but town can not win alongside them. ## Rolelist **[color=red]One-Shot-Invincible Mafia Vigilante[/color]** **[color=orange]One-Shot-Invincible Arsonist[/color]** **[color=gray]One-Shot-Invincible Anarchist[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Macho Bombproof Bomb Defuser[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Macho Fireproof Firefighter[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Macho Bulletproof Doctor[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Tracker[/color]** **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color] x6** ## Role Cards > ## [color=red]One-Shot-Invincible Mafia Vigilante[/color] > **One Shot Invincible** - You survive one kill from any source (except a lynch). You will be notified when this occurs. **Shoot** - Each night phase, you can shoot a player, killing them. **([color=red]Bullet-Kill[/color])** *You win if you are amongst the last two living players.* > ## [color=orange]One-Shot-Invincible Arsonist[/color] > **One Shot Invincible** - You survive one kill from any source (except a lynch). You will be notified when this occurs. **Douse** - Each night phase, you can douse a player in gasoline. They are not notified. **Ignite** - Instead of dousing someone, you can instead ignite all doused players, killing them. **([color=orange]Fire-Kill[/color])** *You win if you are amongst the last two living players.* > ## [color=gray]One-Shot-Invincible Anarchist[/color] > **One Shot Invincible** - You survive one kill from any source (except a lynch). You will be notified when this occurs. **Plant Bomb** - Each night phase, you can plant a bomb on a player. They are not notified. They will explode in two nights, killing them. **([color=gray]Bomb-Kill[/color])** *You win if you are amongst the last two living players.* > ## [color=limegreen]Macho Bombproof Bomb Defuser[/color] > **Bombproof** - You are immune to **[color=gray]Bomb-Kills[/color]**. **Macho** - You can not be targeted by the Firefighter or the Doctor. **Defuse** - Each night phase, you can visit a player. That player can not have a bomb planted on them that night, and if they already had a bomb planted on them, it is defused. They are not notified. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Macho Fireproof Firefighter[/color] > **Fireproof** - You are immune to **[color=orange]Fire-Kills[/color]**. **Macho** - You can not be targeted by the Bomb Defuser or the Doctor. **Cleanup** - Each night phase, you can visit a player. That player can not be doused in gasoline that night, and if they were already doused, it is removed. They are not notified. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Macho Bulletproof Doctor[/color] > **Bulletproof** - You are immune to **[color=red]Bullet-Kills[/color]**. **Macho** - You can not be targeted by the Bomb Defuser or the Firefighter. **Heal** - Each night phase, you can heal a player if they are shot. They are not notified. You can not protect against **[color=gray]Bomb-Kills[/color]** or **[color=orange]Fire-Kills[/color]**. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Tracker[/color] > **Track** - Each night phase, you can follow a player, tracking who they visit that night, if anybody. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=limegreen]Citizen[/color] > Your weapon is your vote. You have no night actions. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* ## [color=cyan]:link: Links:[/color] **[Start of Day One](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-reroll-night-two-13-13/71353/36?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day Two](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-reroll-night-two-13-13/71353/386?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day Three](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-reroll-night-two-12-13/71353/735?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day Four](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-reroll-seeking-replacement-day-four-9-13/71353/930?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day Five](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-reroll-night-four-8-13/71353/1379?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day Six](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-reroll-day-six-5-13/71353/1482?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day Seven](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-viva-la-revolution-reroll-night-six-4-13/71353/1624?u=ashe)** ## Player List: 1. Sarun 2. **orangeandblack5** 3. Solic 4. Marluxion 5. [color=gray]~~htm~~[/color] Vulgard 6. **MaximusPrime** 7. Margaret 8. Firekitten 9. Luxy 10. Memesky 11. **Captain** 12. PokemonKidRyan 13. Icibalus ### Spectators: * Livicus * Twi1light * Boss110 * Blizer * Pug ## Graveyard: 0. Ashe - D0 - **[color=yellow]Ascetic Miller[/color]** 1. Firekitten - D2 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 2. PokemonKidRyan - N2 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 3. Memesky - D3 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 4. Icibalus - N3 - **[color=limegreen]Macho Bulletproof Doctor[/color]** 5. Sarun - D4 - **[color=gray]One-Shot-Invincible Anarchist[/color]** 6. Marl - N4 - **[color=limegreen]Tracker[/color]** 7. Luxy - D5 - **[color=red]One-Shot-Invincible Mafia Vigilante[/color]** 8. Solic - N5 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 9. Margaret - D6 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 10. Vulgard - D7 - **[color=orange]One-Shot-Invincible Arsnoist[/color]**
